title: On the outer
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and Russell Toose
brief_description: Investigates the plight of two of Sydney’s homeless men - one a widower in his sixties, the other a young man in his twenties - against a background of their fellow homeless people and the hostels where they live. Reporter: Richard Oxenburgh. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
